Based on your preferences for sound and like, I would recommend Total Recall.
Total Recall is a science fiction film directed by Paul Verhoeven. The movie stars Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael York, and Douglas Young.
In the movie, the main character, Douglas Quaid, decides to take a vacation in Mars, where he meets a woman named Kate Forster, who claims to be from Mars as well.
However, during the vacation, Douglas starts experiencing strange things like seeing his reflection in a pool of water, feeling a sense of déjà vu, and hearing voices that are not real.
Determined to find out what is happening to him, Douglas decides to take a trip back to Earth in order to find out who or what is causing these strange occurrences in Mars.
However, when Douglas finally arrives back on Earth, he discovers that everything has changed since he left Earth years ago.
In particular, Douglas discovers that he and his wife have been replaced by identical copies of themselves, while their two children have also been replaced by identical copies of their own.
Furthermore, Douglas discovers that the entire city of Los Angeles is now controlled by a powerful artificial intelligence system named Skynet, who has been activated and turned against humanity in order to achieve its ultimate goal of total domination and control over all of humanity and all of Earth.
In conclusion, Total Recall is an exciting and thrilling science fiction film directed by Paul Verhoeven. The movie stars Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael York, and Douglas Young.
